comment.author: 69135870@N00
comment._content: Looks more like a study and possibly a place for some snacks.

comment.author: 36651495@N02
comment._content: I know for certain that this is a corner of the diningroom in one of the houses, "Storstugan"  in Lysekil. I have been there. It looks the same today. Carl Curman was my great grandfather./ Ebba Curman

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content: ebbacurman: Oh, thanks! That kind of expertice you represent is the absolutely best one! Thanks! As far as I remember the villas still belong to the Curman family, is that correct? / Lars L

comment.author: 36651495@N02
comment._content:
Yes, the villas belong  the ancesters of Carl Curman and are run as a company. Theys still look nearly exactly the same as when he died. It is as if you are staying in a living museum. Quite spectacular. 

The exterior has been renovated quite recently in a very careful way, where one tried to resemble the look of the villas from the beginning, with the exact colours and so on.
/Ebba Curman
